press_switch.description: Press the switch to control the water flow.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to control the water flow.

rotate_switch_clockwise.description: Rotate the switch clockwise to increase the water flow.

rotate_switch_counterclockwise.description: Rotate the switch counterclockwise to decrease the water flow.

wipe_switch_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the switch to maintain hygiene.

clean_faucet_base_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the faucet base to maintain hygiene.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to maintain hygiene.

wipe_faucet_base.description: Wipe the faucet base to remove any dirt or stains.

clean_spout_surface.description: Wipe the surface of the spout to ensure clean water flow.

clean_spout.description: Clean the spout to ensure clean water flow.

wipe_spout_interior.description: Clean the interior of the spout to ensure clean water flow.

clean_faucet_parts.description: Clean all the parts of the faucet including the switch, spout, and the base together.

interact_with_switch.description: Press and then release the switch.

clean_entire_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the base, switch, and spout for complete hygiene.

clean_all_faucet_parts.description: Clean all the parts of the faucet including the spout, switch, and the base.

engage_with_switch.description: Rotate the switch clockwise and then back to the original position.

hygiene_maintenance.description: Ensure the cleanliness of all faucet parts including the base, switch, and spout.
